verbs.description: bedrape (third-person singular simple present bedrapes, present participle bedraping, simple past and past participle bedraped)

entries.meaning: To drape, cover or adorn with drapery or folds of cloth, or as with drapery.
examples: The pink and white may, the clumps of lilac, the leafy hedgerows, the verandahs bedraped with mauve wistaria  […] —it was all a sight, I can assure you!
